hits.definition:
刚 (F 剛)

[gāng] firm, (= 刚才 gāngcái) just (a moment ago)

句

[jù] sentence

显 (F 顯)

[xiǎn] appear; 显然 xiǎnrán obvious

衣

[yī] (= 衣服 yīfu) clothing

[yì] wear (clothing), give (clothing) to others to wear

陆 (F 陸)

[lù] land; 大陆 continent

[liù] six (= 六 liù)

送

[sòng] see somebody off, deliver, give

帮 (F 幫)

[bāng] (= 帮助 bāngzhù, 帮忙 bāngmáng) help, gang

愿 (F 願)

[yuàn] wish

奇

[qí] marvellous, (= 希奇 xīqí) rare, strange

[jī] odd (not even)
